Text: Of course with ONLY GREEK SUBS , LIKE AN HDTV MOVIE (better than a DVD-r) ready to enjoy on your new HDTV ... with HDMI !!!!!!!

If someone faces a problem with the movie and sees right to the subtitles a message ostof.avi , PLEASE TURN OFF THE SUBTITLES FROM YOUR DVD PLAYER REMOTE(the movie recognizes ostrof.avi as subtitles) AND EVERYTHING WILL BE OK !!! (GREEK SUBTITLES OFCOURSE WILL BE VISIBLE).
